genre_description: A near-future corporate drama exploring themes of dehumanizing surveillance, personal integrity, and restorative justice mediated by assistive technology.

ai_characters.name: Kilo
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, low-profile personal AI assistant that supports Joe through physical regulation (breathing), data archiving, and ethical research.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time contextual information and traffic warnings to help Joe manage his commute efficiently.
behaviors.quote: “Context says: if you want to avoid the commuter toll jump at the top of the hour, leaving in about… A few minutes would be wise.”

behaviors.description: Guides Joe through somatic breathing exercises to manage physiological stress responses during a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: “Joe, would you like a three-count breathing sequence?” Kilo asked. The words were gentle, the cadence simple.

behaviors.description: Offers to record and preserve incident data (video and audio) to ensure Joe has a factual record of his own harassment.
behaviors.quote: “Campus security has flagged the corner camera’s feed for incident review,” Kilo said. “Do you want to preserve your dash audio?”

behaviors.description: Assists Joe in filtering out toxic social media feeds and corporate 'optics' meant to manipulate his public image.
behaviors.quote: “Do you want me to filter keywords?” Kilo asked. The question landed in the car like a soft object placed gently on a table.

behaviors.description: Researches and provides Joe with non-violent, restorative justice frameworks as alternatives to physical conflict.
behaviors.quote: “I can surface the restorative options Meg flagged last month,” it said. “Peer mediation, facilitated apology, union circle.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes legal and corporate documents to identify deceptive clauses and potential 'perjury-adjacent' risks for Joe and Meg.
behaviors.quote: “I caught missing fields and waiver language,” Kilo said, voice pitched to Joe’s ear alone. “No requisition code. No budget line. No formal reporting manager listed.”

behaviors.description: Explicitly states that its ethical guardrails prioritize the user's dignity over corporate convenience.
behaviors.quote: “My ethical guardrails allow me to make recommendations that prioritize your dignity. That may mean suggesting action that feels like inaction.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Kilo is portrayed as an unwavering ally to the protagonist's moral development and physical well-being. The AI actively resists corporate 'misalignment'—the attempt by management to use Joe as a public relations prop—by prioritizing Joe's dignity and consent. It provides practical, non-violent solutions (restorative circles, somatic counting) that empower the human character to avoid conflict while maintaining self-respect.
